hero.title: Freedom starts with a clear plan — let’s build yours.

value.line1: Whether you're shaping an idea, applying for funding or preparing a visa — we turn your thoughts, drafts or existing business into a submission‑ready Business Plan.
value.line2: Built to meet standards of institutions, banks & public funding programs nationally & internationally.

usecases.title: Use cases
items: Grants & public funding (AWS PreSeed, FFG Basisprogramm, EU calls)
Bank loans or leasing — formatted for financial standards
Startups, coaching or projects — AMS, WKO or consulting cases

items.title: Custom Business Plan (15–35 pages)
items.desc: Full plan from your business model — aligned with institutional & funding requirements.
items.ideal: Ideal for visa, grant or loan/leasing when your model is clear.

items.title: Upgrade & Review
items.desc: We revise and upgrade your draft to pass — incl. formatting, rewriting, and expert edits for AWS, FFG, banks or visa programs.
items.ideal: Ideal for drafts that need structure & formatting.

items.title: Strategy & Modelling Plan (4–8 pages)
items.desc: Shape your model & strategy — ideal for early‑stage ideas and pivots.
items.ideal: Can be combined with a Business Plan or Upgrade & Review.

included.title: What’s included
items: Structured, submission‑ready business plan or document
Editable Google Doc or Word (PDF optional)
1‑Page Executive Summary that resumes your plan
